title: x/tour: moretypes: confusion between XOR and math.Pow
body: At the [moretypes/14](https://tour.golang.org/moretypes/14) page, `x^y` is used to mean exponentiation but the math package uses `x**y`. Also, the [XOR version](http://play.golang.org/p/BTsw_ZSeRF) is prettier than the [math.Pow version](http://play.golang.org/p/3bXV6D1rrR).
